actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from Friday, November 21, 1980, to Monday, December 1, 1980, and a recess of the Senate from Tuesday, November 25, 1980 until Monday, December 1, 1980.

summary.text: Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from November 21, 1980, to December 1, 1980, and a recess of the Senate from November 25, 1980, to December 1, 1980.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from Friday, November 21, 1980, to Monday, December 1, 1980, and a recess of the Senate from Tuesday, November 25, 1980 until Monday, December 1, 1980.
